thread.title: Roku Shares Plunge On Weak Forecast

author: Imani Moise
title: Roku Shares Plunge On Weak Forecast
text:
Shares of Roku Inc. plunged nearly 21% during extended trading Wednesday after the maker of streaming-media devices forecast a steeper-than-expected loss this year.
The company, which posted a loss of $63.5 million in 2017, expects losses for 2018 between $40 million and $55 million. Analysts polled by Thomson Reuters had forecast a loss of $35.9 million. Rokuâ€™s guidance for sales in the current quarter also missed views.
